spec_data.Name: drupal7-rules
spec_data.Description:
The Rules module allows site administrators to define conditionally executed
actions based on occurring events (known as reactive or ECA rules). It's a
replacement with more features for the trigger module in core and the successor
of the Drupal 5 workflow-ng module.

This package provides the following Drupal modules:
* rules
* rules_admin
* rules_i18n
* rules_scheduler
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:04:18 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: React on events and conditionally evaluate actions
